relation: There is a lot to do for fun. Such as shop, movies, eating places, sports, clubs, etc.
The food at WSSU is delicious. There is a variety of choices, flavors and styles. The cafeteria is nice, clean, and presentable.
Dorms are a nice size, they're also clean and spacious.
Winston Salem State University offers great academic studies with friendly and respectful professors.

I would give this school an 8/10. It is a very beautiful campus, filled with friendly and kind people who loves to have fun. The more you are involved and interact with the community, the better, more opportunities and experiences you will receive.

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Kendra from Greensboro, NC 08/06/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 17 out of 17 people found this review useful. 2 of 48 Categories Comments Tips for prospective students My tips for prospective students would be to become a leader do not follow behind everybody that says they are your friends becasue it could lead to trouble, No one babies you in college so become a responsible adult quick, it helps to stay organized, set aside play time and studying time, and never give up on yourself no matter how hard the work may get there are always people around that want to help you survive the college life. Bang for the buck Winston Salem State offers a resonable tuition for in state students. Out of state is always going to be higher, yet it too is a reasonable amout compared to other colleges. Winston Salem makes way for all that want to attend WSSU affordable and stress free. Once you enter Ram Country you will have
